channel.title: NSE:EMKAY on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: India’s First-Quarter Current Account Gap Narrows on Services
item.description: India’s current account gap narrowed in the fiscal first quarter, helped by an increase in service sector exports and larger than anticipated remittances.
